alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Oklahoma and northeastern Canadian Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Oklahoma City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Woodlawn Park, Richland and Wiley Post Airport. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 130 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
